issue.title: [Gandiva] Cast timestamp/date are incorrectly evaluating year 0097 to 1997
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5163](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5163). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Cast timestamp/date functions are incorrectly evaluating year string "0097" to year 1997. It should evaluate to 0097.

In other words any year string length of 4 should be taken as it is and must not be tampered with. Year string "97" should be considered as 1997.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5163?focusedCommentId=16821006) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4146
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4146>
